desc: I booked the Club Room to celebrate my Mum‚Äôs birthday. We were very well-fed throughout our stay. Even though the Club Lounge was under renovation, the Afternoon Tea and Evening Cocktail at the Tea Room far exceeded my expectation. Guest Relation staff also delivered a complimentary cake and card to the room for my mum. With social distancing measures in place, swimming pool slots were limited. But Raymond from Concierge managed to squeeze in slots for us and even extended our check-out timing. Even though we did not manage to swim due to the rainy weather, we still appreciate his kind gesture very much. Kudos to Amara hotel and their staff for the hospitality during our 2D1N staycation.

title: Compliment
desc: Raymond and Siti are one of the best receptionist , I travel often , and Amara has the best service . The service here is TOP notch,better than expected . I‚Äôm so Glad to pamper myself here . No other hotels , 4 or 5 star give me a service like this . Thumbs up .

title: Pleasant stay and helpful staffs
desc: All the staffs are friendly and nice. Raymond helped me with my gf's birthday surprise by delivering the flower bouquet to the room secretly. 5 stars review! One downside is the late check in, the room was only ready at 4 plus after I called in.

title: Pleasant staff
desc: Raymond was a helpful and accommodating staff who gave us a complimentary late checkout to suit the swimming pool timeslot that he managed to squeeze in for us. Sincerely appreciate that! Thanks so much! :)

title: Birthday Dinner
desc: Food is good but for add on order, they forgot about it. Which we were pretty full already. Ambience was good too. Recommended food, its the fried cod, seafood beancurd, steam dumpling, fried string bean. Special mentioned Margaret, Rui Qin, Joanne and Jessy. Lastly Xiao Mei, Mei Ling and Yet Ling were all very attentive and helpful.

title: They gave us a refund when we weren't able to travel
desc: We booked a room at the Amara for July 2020. Because of travel restrictions we were not able to arrive. Amara gave us a full refund. We will definitely book with them when we re-plan our trip, because we know that they take care of their clients.

title: Feedback on the services provided
desc: Enthusiasm service provided by Raymond... thank you for offering good service and solution..the facilities and swimming pool is great.. nice conversation with staff and prevention step taken was good .

title: Amara hotel
desc: The hotel is nice and convenience to go everywhere.. staff here also really practicing social distancing. The pool and gym are nicer too.. esp gym coz they hv complete equipment. Should compliment to mr raymond coz giving us good place to go and restaurant üòäüòä

title: Compliment
desc: Very good, nice and warm service from our friend Raymond. Even though we were far from our family. But he keep smiling and treat us like one of their family. Its good to have such staff like this so that we‚Äôre always welcome and have a good time in this hard time

title: Covid19
desc: The staff Raymond always entertained was good he provided drink to me when my temperature not meet he set with me ask story about me..than I tell him im from Malaysia because of covid19 McDonald's arange a hotel to stay and rest.hotel staff was good to serve what are we need.good job guy's...

title: Compliment - Excellent Service By Hotel Staff
desc: Dear Amara Management Thank you so much for the great + awesome service provided in the hotel today. From the entrance to the farewell its fanatics. Staff in Hotel truly show the #SGunited spirit. Loving the staff smile and service provided especially Siti, Thomas and friends at front desk. Their smile was there thru out the day without fail. Thanks for the service excellent service provided... Thumps up... Cheers Christina

title: The wedding that I imagined
desc: Held my wedding at Amara few months ago, and I didn't regret one bit. (A bit late review, procrastination at it's best :) ) Amelia was super helpful and picked up the details well to ensure our wedding preparations goes well. She gave helpful insights and understood our needs for our special day. She goes an extra mile to execute our needs accordingly. Food was super amazing and I regretted not eating more haha. Chef Rahman (I hope his name is correct) listened to our opinion during food tasting and he adjusted accordingly to our requests and preference for our menu. Family and friends are still talking about the food even up till today. Andy from banquet was super helpful and ensure everything from set-up and food went well. Can never thank him enough. Venue is beautiful

title: Great stay with friendly service!
desc: We stayed for 4d3n in a Club room. Check in process was smooth. The room was a little old school design but no complaints as we had great stay with friendly staff. Shopping centre, 24hrs laundry services, food, all around the hotel. It is soo convenient!! You dont have to take public transport. It is just a walking distance. Would like to specially mentioned Siti,for being soo friendly and accommodating. Raymond that make us feels comfortable throughout our stay and Jenny, housekeeping, to ensure that we have what we need in the room. We will for sure recommend Amara Hotel! :)

title: Friendly
desc: Amara Hotel is nice place to stay and the staff here is very nice I want mention a person is Raymond, he is very friendly n helpful guy. When he saw me always greeting me n he can remember my nameüòäüòäthank you Raymond

title: Compliment
desc: Amara Hotel is nice place to stay and the staff here are very polite and helpful. I want mention 2 person here that always make my day and cheerful. Its Raymond and Siti. Both are so nice to me and help me whenever I lost of info. Especially you Siti, you are such nice person that I met and such excellent service you provide. Everytime you saw me, definately give me a big smile and I really like your smile. The hotel should keep such person and to keep moving forward for good service with this team and reward them. Definately I will come back again to this hotel with my family to enjoy here.

title: Great Rest, Wonderful Staycation
desc: My stay with my family in Amara Hotel has been memorable. We booked a staycation as our overseas holiday was disrupted by the Covid-19 issue. So this staycation was meant to replace the holiday and spend time with family. Upon checking in, we were pleasantly surprised with an upgrade to a suite, thank you Amara Hotel and team for your kind generosity. My family used the swimming pool and enjoyed our time together. Last but not least, I would like to highlight hotel staff, Raymond for his exceptional service and hospitality to my family. Raymond provided food recommendations and kind advice on travelling around Amara hotel. His personalised service stands out as 6 stars for a 5 star hotel. Thank you Amara hotel, team and Raymond. My family will be back again because you

title: Excellent service!
desc: I've spent over 2 months on this hotel, the service is at high level, convenient location -walking distance to Marina Bay, restaurants and markets near by! Also there is a very nice and large swimming pool! I highly recommend it!

title: covid 19
desc: I was affected by the covid 19 Malaysia lockdown.I feel this hotel is compassionate to give us a special rate for the next fourteen days. I will recommend Amara hotel for my colleagues. Its is very convenient and have many facilities example swimming pools and gym. The room service also excellent. The lobby costumer service is very good understanding our plight especially Siti and Raymond.

title: Excellent food and service at Amara cafe oriental
desc: Excellent service by Margaret Choong and staff. They are very accommodative to additional requests by us. The set lunch is value for money @ 9.90 with good variety and beverages. Highly recommended if you are looking for a relaxing and good ambience atmosphere to beat the lunch time crowd at CBD.

title: Average 4* hotel but good location
desc: My girlfriend and I stayed at this hotel for 3 nights. The overall experience was ok but nothing exceptional. Liked ¬∑ The location is really good. It‚Äôs right in the business district and a few minutes walk from the underground station Tanjong Pagar. Staff are friendly and the hotel is very very spacious both the rooms & the common areas. Breakfast is well organized with quite a lot of choice. Disliked ¬∑ The premises are quite old and the rooms in general need to be refurbished. The TV is at least 15 years old the toilet looks very consumed.

title: Hotbed for mosquitos
desc: There is a large pond near the swimming pool of the 6th floor that has stationery water it seems for weeks as there are numerous mosquito larvae in the water. I hope they clear it soon as in this Covid-19 pandemic period, no one wants to worry about getting dengue too! Scary...

title: Good service and good food
desc: We have local set lunch in the element. The food is very delicious and the service is very nice,especially Helen Kuo and Margaret Choong. Both of them are very friendly that we are really enjoy our lunch time. We will come back soon.

title: Wonderful customer service
desc: Held a 3-day event at Amara Singapore and had the pleasure to meet Jeffrey, the banquet manager for our event. He was the sweetest! Given the short staffed situation due to COVID-19, there were just 2-3 staffs around to assist in our event. But Jeffrey took care of my team and arranged for whatever request my trainers and team requested for. Wonderful customer service and he is so active given his age! Thank you Jeffrey for going the extra mile! Hope to meet you again one day!

title: We had an enjoyable Dinner Banquet
desc: Amelia Lim was our main coordinator for our wedding from the start till the end of our Dinner Banquet. She assisted us with multiple changes and was prompt with her replies due to also the COVID-19 situation. We admire her professionalism and will like to thank her here once again for the her great assistance and making our wedding day smooth. We also like to thank Jeffrey Goh for operating our Tea Ceremony and Banquet well. Last min call for individual plating aren't easy, yet the hotel made it happen. Thank you so much. We also like to thank the concerige team for dilligently helping us to move items from one place to another. We had an overall positive experience. But, nothing is perfect, my guests mentioned that the fish was a little overcooked but the roasted chicken

desc: Stayed for a week business trip and my god this hotel is horrible. First night there, call to feedback about the hot air-conditioning that the in room controller was useless. The hotel had sent a repairman up to look at the unit (in the ceiling) and the repairman had told me that the controller was indeed spoilt and that there was no way i could tune the air temperature myself. However, he had tuned the temperature in the air con system directly and the cold air should come through soon. On the second day, still no change to the air con; had requested to change rooms. The same problem persisted in the second room. The whole situation repeated itself with the hotel sending another repairman to the room to fix the air conditioning but in vain. title: 6 Star Customer Relation Experience
desc: We were a family of 4 who stayed here for 3d 2n, absolutely had the best customer experience compared to all hotels I have been to, and I have traveled a lot for business in the last couple of years. Hats off to Raymond who goes out of his way to ensure we have the best possible staying experience, even without being asked :) Keep up the awesome work Raymond, and I hope you never get tired of being really good at this!

title: Excellent staff and service
desc: Very good hotel. Room is very nice, Food also good and the service and staff very excellent especially Raymond. He very helpful and good person and also very professional person. Near Hotel have mall and others local food restaurant.

title: Amazing service and GREAT PILLOWS
desc: I had another amazing stay at the AMARA Singapore. I was upgraded to a suite with a view of the sea between the buildings. Amazing! The bed and pillows are so comfortable - I always sleep so well there. The location is great - a grocery store below with lots of food choices in the mall next door (that is connected). Also food stalls across the streets. As always the service was great. Before my visit I had some shopping sent in advance and Raymond was so helpful in collecting them for me and sending them to my room. I had a late flight so Raymond arranged for me to have access to the pool so I could relax and then shower before leaving for the airport. When getting to the airport I realized that I forgot my toiletry bag - and housekeeping said they would send it to me.

title: Great Stay at Amara
desc: The hospitality at Amara is exceptional. The great service provided by the concierge team and especially Raymond went above and beyond in supplying his guests the greatest hotel service ever!! Would recommend to stay here

title: Attentive Service and Old School Charm
desc: Amara in Tanjong Pagar is a home away from home in the bustling CBD. The concierge desk there is outstanding: attentive, proactive and exudes old school hotel charm that is lacking in most modern hotels. Of note is Raymond, who goes out of his way to ensure a guest feels at home, and looks out for their needs and welfare to make business trips seamless. He is a wealth of information on places to visit and dine in Singapore. Excellent service!

title: Wedding and hotel stay
desc: Wonderful team on assist on my wedding event. Glad I make the right choice. Hotel is clean and staffs are very friendly and warm. Recommended! Special thanks to Amelia from the wedding department. Love it

title: Convenient location
desc: Our 2-nights stay at AMARA Singapore was amazing. The room was modern and big room with the fantastic city view.We have tried nasi lemak at Element restaurant. The taste is really delicious. The location was convenient and near shopping mall. All staff were helpful.

title: Excellent Club Lounge
desc: We stayed in this hotel for 10 nights over the christmas period in a club room on the 17th floor. This is the same floor that the club lounge is situated. Firstly, this lounge is staffed by two lovely ladies who work alternate shifts. Both these ladies are a credit to the hotel and themselves. The service they provided was outstanding. I hope the hotel appreciates just how good these two are and rewards them appropriately. We had breakfast in the club lounge most mornings as the breakfast room for all the other guests on the ground floor was very busy and noisy. You could get meals cooked just for you that arrived hot, unlike the downstairs buffet. Each evening the club lounge provides free cocktail and any other type of drink for free between 6pm and 8pm. desc: On arrival reception staff very vague and never explained hotel rules the room on floor 18 was showing signs of wear poor sockets and holes around shower head on the whole a nice room. In the club rooms we were entitled too laundry[two items] and club access included in the price during our stay this was not explained at reception and would note this for future guests on arrival. title: Another great Stay
desc: My wife and I once again stayed at the Amara. This trip was taken for our wedding anniversary and were really blown away by the staff giving us a cake as a small token of congratulations. There have been a few changes from the last stay, and to the most I would say they are an improvement. We ate in three of the inhouse restaurants and found the service, pricing and quality of the food first-class. The only disappointment was that the open bar area has been replaced with an enclosed cocktail bar. I found this a little odd as the old bar area had live music and was a great place to unwind after a day out in the heat. I personaly felt a little closed in while having an exhobitantly priced drink in the new bar. I think the mood was designed to be intimate with dim lighting and jaz

title: Cafe Oriental - terrific local food
desc: The Amara has a tremendous collection of restaurants such as the recently refurbished Thanying. Typically, coffee shops in restaurants are bland and forgettable, notable only for their convenience. But Cafe Oriental really does feature an excellent variety of local Singapore cuisine. I tried their Penang laksa which was absolutely great. It has generous amounts of jumbo prawns and Chinese sausage, which I washed down with a wonderful teh tarik. I live in Singapore but I will probably take guests here to try out local delicacies. The service was faultless by the way.

title: Good service, good location but room is quite dated
desc: All perfect for a couple of nights business stay as everything you need is there but place (well, at least the room I was staying) needs refurbishment. Bathroom and room itself with all furniture look a bit outdated and a bit tired. Otherwise I would be quite happy to come back

title: Good
desc: I haven‚Äôt stayed here for a couple of years and it was good to be back, the service remains excellent and the rooms, although relatively compact, are well equipped, modern and quiet. I was on the 6th floor and it was surprise that my room was actually up a few steps ‚Äì odd that its not on the same level or that there was no ramp. Perhaps not the room for older people or those with heavy luggage to stay.

title: A good hotel, good hospitality
desc: A nice and good hotel where they take their guest seriously. they go into great length to make you feel welcome and to get things organised for you. we felt very much at home in this hotel especially because of two members of their staf Siti and Raymond.

title: Needs alot of Improvement
desc: This hotel has a good potential, but it needs alot of Improvement, in terms of replacing the furniture, fixing the bathrooms, working on the AC filters, etc. I have stayed there for 6 nights for a business trip. And i will list down the positive things first: 1- good room size 2- iron table and an iron in the room 3- big safe that fits my big laptop as well 4- free minibar (my booking i think included thay) 5- great location, near a metro station, infront of a bus station and infront of Fairprice (like Carrefour) supermarket 6- good view Now the negative thing: 1- moldy bathroom with mulfunction shower 2- the room smell is not healthy, although it is a non smoking room 3- the furniture is old and needs maintenance 4- average breakfast As a conclusion, wont stay in it

Bar-roque, a highly rated resto is located within the hotel premises. A lot of dining and shopping places are within walking distance. 2. Front Desk staff- generally friendly. title: Excellent Service from Amara Singapore
desc: I will like to compliment Jodi, Joseph and Isa from the event and banquet ops team for your excellent service rendered on 15 Jan 2020 that helps in the successful execution of our event at Amara. Nonetheless, i will like to thank Ira as well for her swift follow-up in our venue confirmation and bookings. As this year marks the few consecutive years of our partnership, We look forward to having more event with Amara Singapore in the near future.

title: Great experience at Amara Singapore
desc: My husband and I chose Amara Singapore for our wedding lunch banquet in December 2019. The service rendered by Mr Joseph Pua and Mr Jeffrey Goh was of 5-star standards. We were very pleased and we felt that the team at Amara went the extra mile to make our big day a success. We are very grateful and will definitely recommend this hotel for their food, location, spacious bridal suite and their warm service.

title: The perhaps best receptionists of the world
desc: Thanks to the receptionists Madame Raymond and Siti and Mr. Tem for a tourist family who booked this wonderfull hotel the wrong month! Thanks for your understanding and kindliness! title: Great stay
desc: We stayed for 3 nights at the Amara. It is central and easy to get to the MTR and bus stops. Raymond was fantastic - great suggestions on where to go and what to do. The breakfast was quite good. It was a good way to start the day and offered a range of food.

title: Amara Singapore

title: Good hotel
desc: Stayed here for two night, the rooms are spacious and pretty standard as any 4star hotel. title: Good hotel, great location and EXCELLENT concierge! (RAYMOND!)

Many good restaurants nearby. The hotel staff are responsive. I had some issue with the room, but the manager came and sorted it out immediately. We also used the swimming pool which is nice for a time relaxation.

title: Excellent service
desc: I used the function room for our corporate event, Joseph and Jeffery provided thoughtful and attentive service, we are very appreciative that they were there for us. Definitely will be back again. Thank you.

Recovering immediately after Sauna at the other hotel I regularly stay in Singapore. title: Excellent Service and Location
desc: We were greeted to Amara after a early morning flight into Singapore. The team at Amara was professional and courteous at all times. Amara is situated in a good location and adjoined to the 100am shopping mall. Having a shopping mall gives you a selection if eateries if you feel too tired to go further out to eat. Taxis to Sentosa island (if you plan to visit USS or SEA Aquarium) are relatively cheap as well (from memory about $11sgd) Would like to give a special thanks to Raymond who was very friendly and also gave us tips on local eateries! Would definately stay here again the next time we visit Singapore! :)

title: Event / Banquet Services
desc: Our company held our event with Amara Singapore annually and I wish to give thanks to Jeffrey Goh (Asst Banquet Operations Manager) for always making sure every details is well taken of and even if there are issues , for taking the shortest time to attend to our needs. Kudos to him & the team. Thank you.

title: Relaxed vacation
desc: Friendly, excellent, helpful customer service. Raymond at Reception went beyond his duty to help us with great recommendations for our stays and was very attentive. We appreciate him and the entire crew for their awesome service. Hotel is just across street from numerous of local eateries. Our stay at Amara was very pleasant and enjoyable. Can‚Äôt wait to come back again soon.

title: BEST WEDDING BANQUET SERVICE
desc: Was very impressed by the service of Mr. Jeffrey Goh (Assistant Banquet Operation Manager) and Amelia Lim (Senior Sales Manager). Without them the wedding will not go as smooth as it went. Was also very accomodating to all requests made. Hotel breakfast food was great with wide selection. Room is clean and hygiene.

title: Amazing service and staff, great location but a little outdated
desc: Had a wonderful stay at Amara which has a great location and PT access (MRT just behind the hotel), a shopping mall next door and plenty of food nearby (Maxwell food centre, China town and another local Hawker Stall just a few minutes walk away)! We had a small issue with a funny smell in the room which was investigated by the maintenance crew and several other staff but in the end were kindly put in another room by the hotel staff very efficiently! The staff were very attentive and always happy to help, really friendly and genuinely cared about our time in Singapore :) Highly recommend if you're looking for a conveniently located place and a pleasant stay in Singapore!

title: Sharon - Excellent Sevice
desc: We were welcome by Sharon‚Äôs infectious smile upon arrival. During our dinner, she takes the effort to orientate us the different stations and recommended a great bottle of California Red. Great Service and we will definitely be back for more!

title: Dinner Buffet
desc: The food was amazing and the service very forthcoming. Especially Mdm Sharon went the extra mile and amazed us even more. The good was well presented and immediately refilled when stocks were running low.

title: Excellent
desc: A very good hotel with its strategic location next to a mall and mrt station within 5 mins. Rooms were well appointed and staff were satisfactory. However one pet peeve of mine is that I have requested for connectong rooms as i was travelling with small children weeks ahead of my arrival. This was unfortunately not fulfilled with the standard answer of will accomodate based on availability. In the end, we had to go back and forth across 2 rooms which is an inconvenience. Other than this, nothing else to fault. Will return.

title: Collected a parcel...
desc: Raymond at concierge has a 6th sense! He knew who I was as soon as I said why I was there. Great service and funny guy. Always makes you happy to be greeted with a character. Thanks a lot, Xmas parcel received.

title: A wonderful base to come home to in Singapore
desc: The most impressive part of our stay at The Amara was definitely the staff. The whole team are friendly, helpful and always welcoming. Special call out to Raymond who gave us great suggestions and recommendations to fill our time in Singapore. We (3 adults) stayed in the 2 bedroom apartment which was fantastic. Having the kitchen and lounge made a big difference for relaxing at the end of the day and would recommend upgrading to this room over two separate rooms. Room was very clean and well appointed. Only criticism is the coffee, though to be fair it's difficult to find good

title: Great hotel!
desc: Especially Raymond at the reception was so kind and helpful. Great korean restaurants and chinatown nearby. The club lobby is great to relax with a cocktail. Friendly staff, good breakfast, nice pool.

title: Great location

title: Birthday dinner at Silk road restaurant

desc: Clean rooms, best housekeeping, great amenities, fluffy towels. The housekeeping supervisors popped in to check if everything was in order almost everyday throughout my stay. Nice pool with plenty of pool towels provided and clean changing room by the poolside. Will stay again.

title: Team Building Lunch
desc: Variety of foods, drinks and desserts. Staffs react promptly to request and provide good services, especially Mark, Margaret, Tia and Sharon. Foods replenish promptly as well. Foods taste nice and especially creme brulee, there's jack fruits filling inside. Salad and fruits are fresh and crunchy, roast meat are really tasty and the choices of cheese are wide.

title: Twice the price, half the quality, never staying again
desc: I was excited to stay for the first time at the Amara hotel. Now I‚Äôm excited to never stay here again. I like to try different mid-range hotels when I‚Äôm in Singapore. Usually I can get a great room for 100-150 USD downtown. I decided to go closer to the 200 USD range for a night and try the Amara hotel. The lobby was fantastic. The check in and staff was fantastic. Check out and getting a taxi booked was great. Everything looked 4-star (Agoda lists it as 5-star). Upon entering the room, the room and bathroom was big. Then my stay made a left turn down mediocre lane. Here are the reasons why the Amara is a 100 USD charging 200 USD a night. 1. The wifi is my biggest complaint. I have video conferences regularly and expect a 5-star (or even a 4-star) hotel to have

title: One of the best place for corporate events
desc: Did a 2-day seminar at Amara Hotel for a big group of 60. Kudos to the responsive sales team and hospitable ops team, my event went well. The staff has stepped up beyond what they needed. They have tried their best to accommodate to the varying requests and need of the participants and organiser. Will consider organising other events at the hotel again!

title: Arrogant hotel with holed bath towel
desc: This hotel is supposed to be a 4-star property but I was shocked when their bath towel has 2 holes. The towel was really old yet still in use. It is really unbecoming to provide guests with towels with holes. This shows that there is no quality control in this hotel. I tried to alert them (not complain) to this matter by emailing them a photo of the torn towel after my stay but they have not bothered to thank me for my alert or reply to my email. I emailed them twice but not a word from them. I have never encountered arrogance of such level from a hotel. Forget about giving any feedback to this hotel. I will never set foot in this hotel again.

title: Excellent short trip
desc: Our short stay at the Amara was great. The team of staff at the hotel were professional and helpful. Raymond in particular showed good knowledge and initiative. He was even able to contact my parents friend who they had not seen in over 40 years. The location is convenient - close to the underground station and easy to get taxis to and from.

title: Marriage banquet
desc: Overall it was a good experience. Amy Jeffery Joseph has gave us lots of advice. Banquet food was good and the team gave us lots of assistance on the actual day. Bridal studio was not fanstatic but good enough; we had a great time.

title: Dinner at Element
desc: Price was very reasonable, and staff was very polite and helpful. I would like to give special thanks to Tia and Joanne ü•≥, they were exceptionally attentive to the surrounding. The food and variety were great, the dessert choices are awesome. Highly Recommendedüëç

title: Dinner
desc: Good service from wendy wong ,friendly and approachable. The food was good and the atmosphere was great that gives appetite to the food. The service was well managed because the waiter were active and this can be seen from how they frequently serve tea. Furthermore, the time serving taken to serve all the dish were excellent and well balanced such that it makes the overall experience pleasant

title: Tia and Kayla is amazing
desc: We had such an amazing night at element at tras, the staff were so helpful... nothing was too much to ask, so friendly food was amazing... and wine of course ite amazing too...we are truly grateful for the amazing night we had with Tia and Kayla..Definitely we will back again!!!

title: Fun professional warm
desc: Easy vibe, staff are on it in a great way... welcoming knowledgable and relaxed. Had an excellent evening... call out to Tia, sophie,Mary... thank you for the laughter! Excellent beer on tap.. Pilsner Urquell and O‚ÄôHaras and very flexible happy hour..üòâ I will be back again..thanks to Amara for the great staff. Element on tras best

title: The Three Musketeers of Amara
desc: Im back in Singapore and of course in Amara Hotel. I consider this a special trip as aside from my usual work related activities, I would have the opportunity to bond with my niece who has decided to join me in Singapore. This being her first time there, I wanted to give her a delightful experience of staying in a hotel that is accessible and close to landmarks. I had planned to check out and find a hotel that is more affordable to my purse. However, due to the special attention and assistance accorded to me by The Three Musketeers of Amara - Thomas/Raymond/Siti, I decided to stay and continue to enjoy the amenities and comfort that only Amara can give its loyal customers. My niece truly felt at home and glad that Amara was a big part of our bonding time in Singapore. On

title: They've thought of everything
desc: We stayed for 2 nights as a base to see the city. The hotel is a short walk from the metro station (5 mins at a brisk pace, 10 mins slowly or with luggage). The bus stop for the bus to Raffles Hotel (for your Singapore sling) is a 5min walk. It is right beside the Chinatown area which is brimming with eating options, not all of them asian. There is a hawker nearby for food options, two or three stops on the bus. The staff couldn't have been more helpful. The room was very clean and spacious, we were in the standard double. The selection of toiletries includes a toothbrush and small tube of toothpaste - very handy for a long haul flight. Hairdryer, shampoo, conditioner, shower cap, body lotion, shower gel all provided. The swimming pool is wonderful for a hotel pool. Full 25m lap

title: Drinks at Tapas bar
desc: The service is excellent and atmosphere is extraordinary. I love coming to Amara as there is happy hour. The food is excellent The staff Tia, Jimmy, Kayla, Sophie, Anne and Helen are all fantastic and very friendly and helpful.

title: Npp2020
desc: Best hotel to stay. Staff is very trendily breakfast is excellent . And hotel location is very good near to mall. Thanks to Raymond and front desk staff Siti for all your help.Rooms are clean and also Gym is good üëç

title: Singapore break
desc: We chose this hotel on location and reviews, we were not disappointed a beautiful hotel in a great location for everything 10 minutes to Sentosa 10 minutes to the gardens by taxi and the staff here are amazing nothing is too much trouble just find Raymond and Siti and you will be made to feel like you are a vip, breakfast was a great variety and plenty of it all in all very good value. Rooms are great and our view was good in such a built up city. Loved our stay here and would definitely come back

title: Thoroughly enjoyed our wedding at Amara!
desc: Held a wedding banquet at Amara's ballroom with Amelia as the senior sales manager who was coordinating our banquet needs. The AD banquet coordinator Joseph and the asst manager Jeffrey were also very helpful in ensuring that the banquet run smoothly. My guests also complimented the banquet food. Location of the hotel is great since there is a mall just downstairs with lots of Japanese restaurants and shops (including DonDonDonki/Don Quixote). Opposite the hotel there are hawker center, shophouses and even the bubble tea shop Woobbee.

title: Staying 28 days at the time....
desc: The rooms are good, the staff is good, the food is good, the service is good. Everything about Amara is good :) Pool area is nice. Breakfast in this hotel is one of the best i've tried in Asia :) I stay at the hotel for 28 days at the time, and chosen this hotel among all the hotels.

title: Awesome Stay
desc: I had a really pleasant stay. Raymond at the reception was very helpful and sweet. Overall, all the services were amazing, great hospitality and my trip was really smooth! Thanks to Amara and Raymond!

title: 2 nights in October
desc: great service and help by all staff, Henry, Siti ....Very friendly, also walking distance to train, restaurants, and markets ... I will be back again. Price is reasonable and inclusive of breakfast and checkout flexible.

title: Silk road restaurant in Amara hotel
desc: Was serve by Wendy Wong and Jessie Wong. Both are very friendly and gave very good recommdation on the choice of food even though we are using the entertainer app which means the bill will be 50% off. Service standard was above our expectations.

title: Great location and staff
desc: We stay at Amara because the CBD location can‚Äôt be beat and is extremely convenient for both business and leisure travelers ‚Äî walking distance to the MRT and surrounded by a huge variety of F&B, shopping (100am, International Plaza and Tanjong Pagar Center) and a stone‚Äôs throw away from iconic Chinatown, Club St, etc. In terms of amenities, though comfortable, the rooms could use a little upgrade overall. What makes up for this is the hotel‚Äôs great staff. Raymond and Siti at the front desk are extremely personable and warm ‚Äî they make an effort to connect with the guests and we really appreciate that. It would be our 3rd time staying and certainly not our last because of them!

title: Go for the newly refurbished rooms, and the Crab Buffet at Elements
desc: Stayed here for 3 nights and I'd like to commend the front desk and concierge staff for their friendly and professional attitude. They always served with a smile, and they remember your name... The room maintenance technician was also very friendly and efficient. I was initially assigned to a room on the 18th floor, which was frankly quite dated, and in dire need of refurbishment. But shifted to a newly refurbished room on the 6th floor and it was tastefully decorated and spotlessly clean. Wooden laminate floors instead of dusty carpets. Open-planned cabinets and a walk-in wardrobe. They even had a toilet seat warmer and washlet bidet, with a remote control. The crab buffet at Elements was excellent (do refer to pics). Mud crabs, Alaskan crabs, hairy crabs, prawns, clams,

title: Amazing hotel
desc: Amara hotel is located in the central business district of Singapore and the amenities are amazing the entire experience start the moment you enter the hotel the friendly and very knowledgeable staff Raymond and Siti greet you with warm and make you feel right at home .. away from home! Excellent service from the room to the food HIGHLY RECOMMEND!

title: Amara Buffet
desc: Great food, great location and most of all got an instant friend @sharon. Sharon was very accomodating and friendly staff. Food are all fresh, i love the sashimi, im not a prawn eater but their prawn are irresistible and scallops wow. Also not to forget the crispy pork (meat are tender while the skin is crispy). Thank you sharon and element

title: Highly recommend for accomodation and Chinese dining!
desc: We stayed in Amara Hotel for two days. Location is very convenient - 5 mins away from the MRT, with a supermarket located just beside it. There are also plenty of local food options inside and opp the hotel. Most memorable is our dinner at Silk Road restaurant (located in the hotel). Service staff were friendly on the two occassions we visited. They were very attentive to our needs, for eg, when they noted from our orders that we were sharing some dishes, they proactively split them into two portions for our consumption. Dishes were also promptly cleared so we could fully enjoy the incoming dishes. Food wise, it was definitely a treat for the tastebuds so we would highly recommend dropping by this restaurant for an enjoyable Chinese dining experience :)

title: Amara with a smile
desc: Spent four days here and it is highly recommended. The first thing you notice is the delightful receptionists, very helpful and always smiling. Perfect area close to Chinatown and a MRT station. Restaurants in the area are numerous with plenty of variety. A handy 24 hr supermarket is just over the road for handy pick ups. As said I highly recommend the Amara.

title: Good Service
desc: Our BA flight was delayed for a day and my daughter and I were put up in the hotel for a night. The food and service were outstanding, especially Raymond the Manager who ensured we were taken care of. The rooms are however, slightly tired looking and could do with a little more TLC. All in all, a good experience.

title: Perfect stay
desc: Raymond is fantastic and he did everything that we felt comfortable in that hotel and during our stay in Singapore. Just because of Raymond it‚Äôs worth staying here. We really enjoyed the time in Singapore . It was even a greater experience with our little son.

title: Second time staying
desc: My recent stay was disappointing. The room was not well maintained. I stayed on the 18th floor. The faucet was leaking, the drainage poor and the water pressure was too low. The pillow case had multiple holes perhaps from being too worn out. Despite supplying 2 pillows, they were too flat, unable to provide any reasonable neck support while sleeping which made it uncomfortable. The leather on the arm rest of the chair had also flaked and faded. I'm not sure I will stay again. I did the express check out, hopefully my deposit will be reversed.

title: Great hotel and service
desc: Strongly recommend this nice hotel in superb location just south of China town. Decent rooms, amongst the best Chinese (Sichuan) and Thai restaurants in Singapore. Special mention for supremely helpful concierges Raymond and Henry who made this hotel experience so great!

title: Good stay
desc: Stayed here for a business trip. It is a nice hotel. I was on the 13th floor and the room was large, and it was quiet. Fast check in and check out, and friendly staff. Breakfast was included in the rate and there is western, Chinese and Japanese options.

title: Special surprise for birthday!
desc: Good taste and good service with surprise cake for my birthday! Also good to have lunch with family. spicy but very tasty ma po tofu with fried rice. We always order this. Thanks for great service, Wendy Wong!

title: You won‚Äôt believe this...
desc: I am traveling for work from Toronto, Canada and my shirt required ironing for an important meeting. Siti at the front desk recognized this and I advised her that my ironing skills were sub par - she pleasantly joked about me being pampered and insisted on personally ironing my shirt while I had breakfast. I entered the lunch meeting with a newfound confidence so much so that I sprayed chili oil on my shirt and my Asian business partners were scrambling to source tonic water and other measures to salvage the shirt that they knew I valued due to Siti at Amara. Unfortunately the Chili Oil left its impression and I ended up purchasing a white shirt from Zara for our afternoon meetings. When I returned to the hotel both Siti & Raymond (concierge) noticed I had changed my shirt

title: Best customer service ever
desc: I normally do not write any reviews unless the property provided an extraordinary service and they certainly went beyond my expectations. We were a group of 10 people on biz trip to Singapore and chose this hotel for its club room benefits. When we arrived at the hotel, however, the club lounge was under renovation. As we mainly chose this hotel for its club benefits such as the lounge, I have brought this issue to the duty manager, Thomas. He immediately came to our room and explained why they had to renovate the club room but offered an even better benefits. The afternoon tea was provided at more luxurious Tea Room with better food and tea, and the evening cocktail was provided at Element on Tras. Honestly, the food and drinks provided were much better than what we would

title: Great and attentive service
desc: The si chuan chinese restaurant by Amara Singapore provides great and authentic si chuan cuisine. Their mapo beancurd is one of my favourite food over the menu and their eight treasure tea here is different from other places. It contains walnut. Great and attentive service specially thanks to Pauline and Mei Geok. Definitely will visit this reataurant again.

title: Great hotel with good location
desc: Enjoy stay for 2 nights here, great place for local shopping and near MRT. Department store just across the street. Hotel staff is very helpful. Small suggestion from me to hotel is that minor touch-up work in room, the rest is superb Will recommend to all.

title: Super concierge Raymond
desc: Hotel very good easy location for the underground and a walk up to the Chinese Quarter Raymond on the desk went the extra mile to give us an option to use bus and boat to get around Only 2 stops away from the centre at City Hall

title: First time in Amara
desc: Very hospitable and nice hotel. Raymond, siti and henry have been particularly nice in helping us out. Looking forward to visiting again. Ambience is wonderful. Right next to the metro. Recommendeded to anyone travelling to singapore.

title: Martin and Cindy Wedding
desc: The service is very good. They serve on time. The food is amazingly delicious and they are very approachable. Specially Ms Wendy Wong she serve and give us what we want. Thank you very much. More success to come.

title: What a pleasant stay
desc: Amara Singapore is centrally located and is just a short walk to Tanjung Pagar MRT Station. The hotel room is very clean and is tastefully decorated. The bed was very comfortable. Strongly recommended to go for premium executive room which gives free club access where you can enjoy variety of food after a long day of working. Hotel staff such as Raymond is extremely helpful and accommodating. He is indeed a great asset to the hotel.

title: Great hotel for the price
desc: Good location - walking distance to China Town a mall right beside it and shops across the street, good food - okay buffet breakfast spread, and great staff...Raymond at the lobby was very helpful and accommodating.

title: Comfort and friendliness
desc: From the time I arrived I was met with friendly and helpful service. Raymond at the Concierge desk and his staff were wonderfully helpful with map, directions to the MRT and friendly greetings. Breakfasts were a delight to jaded tastebuds. Not only is this a convenient location it is also interesting if you care to explore on foot.

title: Where I stay in Singapore!
desc: Love this hotel - great hotel in a great location with great staff! There is a shopping centre attached to the hotel with a supermarket and many food choices. So convenient. Special shout out to Raymond on the concierge desk who is absolutely wonderful and so helpful.

title: Work Trip
desc: Rooms a little dated however Raymond was amazing as a concierge recommending local relaxation retreats and helping out with transport and dining recommendations. Cool chill out bar at the rear and great cocktail bar

title: Disappointing
desc: I'll give 2 stars only for friendly staff. I have changed 3 rooms. First room, was mouldy and smelled of dampness, second rooms walls were mouldy, 3rd room paint was peeling of the walls, bathroom walls were mouldy, AC never been cleaned, but I just gave up and stayed there. Unfortunately, my stay was over 2 weeks, so it was very uncomfortable. I would not recommend that hotel at all.

title: Convenient location
desc: It is centrally located with easy access to MRT and China town within few minutes of walk. The place is clean with courteous staff and restaurants and pubs near by. The swimming pool and gym adds to staying experience. Overall a good convenient place to stay in Singapore.

title: Drinks and Tapas food Serve By Tia ...
desc: Tia was such a refreshing welcoming face after a long tiring day . She helped us to decide what was good on the menu ... and excellent choice if scallops , garlic prawns , grilled veggies and chicken wings accompanied by peroni beer ... and excellent choice . It was really nice sitting outside at Element an tras just outside Amara hotel Singapore. The embience , the taste the warm friendly staff was an ideal composition for a relaxing evening .

title: Comfortable with great service
desc: LOVE the Amara hotel. And not just the great pillows. The staff are so amazing. I had some packages sent there and Raymond did an excellent job helping me resolve and issue. They have a nice pool area and all rooms have great city views. Cant wait to go back!

title: Good Choice For Gathering
desc: Excellent service and Chinese food.They give us good recommendation of their signature food and inform on the promotion offered in the restaurant.I really love the fried rice here.Prices are also decent for a hotel restaurant.

title: Very helpful staffs & excellent service!
desc: Our stay in Amara Singapore was always very nice, especially get to know Raymond from concierge. He was very attentive & very helpful. The other staffs Zac & Siti were very helpful too, great service. Great location for all levels of travellers!

title: First Timer
desc: I was quite hesitant to book for this hotel because if its price considering that I will not be staying most of the time in the room as our event venue is in a different property. Howeve, the coziness of the room will lull you to rest after a very tiring day. Language barrier is not an issue here because receptionists can speak and understand English. Even the breakfast receptionists are very welcoming and greets you very warmly. I even asked if they have a money exchange and said yes but they directed me to a nearby money exchange stall for a better rate. And this is honesty from a provider, which is rare for some. They have an international breakfast variation so its easier for foreign guests to choose according to their taste. WiFi access is not a problem. It's fast and

title: Excellent service and Helpful staff
desc: The stay was super comfortable. Staff is ver nice and helpful especially Raymond from concierge. I accidentally dropped my wallet in the hotel lift and he made sure that I got it back. Also, we needed some help since our devices does not fit the wall socket but he also found a way for us to use our equipment. Very big thanks to Raymond and the Amara team. Will be back on my next trip

title: Drinks and tapas food
desc: Visited the place in the chilled afternoon, I was delighted and extremely impressive for this tapas restaurant. I ordered prawns and wine to enjoy and they looked super tasty. Last but not least, Tia and Anne from here were extreamly helpful and friendly, would come back again definitely!!!

title: Excellent Service and Nice Food!
desc: Excellent service rendered by service staff, especially Wendy Wong, friendly chef, great food, nice environment, good for get together, be it with family, friends or business. Will definitely be back soon!

title: Good property!
desc: Nice rooms, good restaurant, fabulous pool and very conveniently located. Tanjong pagar mrt is just 5mins walk, taxi stand and bus stops are right in front of the hotel. Though hotel is really good in all aspects including hospitality the fact that it has a mall within its premise makes it great including a ntuc fair price shop in the basement. Within walking distance are numerous pubs which i guess would be a great place to unwind in the evenings especially on a weekend. Overall a wonderful stay... oh and ya they serve H√§agen-Dazs as desert for buffet... definitely a highlight üòä

title: Great bartender Tia and drink!
desc: I went for a solo drink and asked for lychee martini. The bartender Tia was so friendly and great at getting my drink! It was fun interacting with her! She was attentive and fast! Will definitely be back!! :) thank you!!

title: Excellent food and service
desc: We enjoyed the afternoon tea set at the Amara tea room. The food and tea was great and the ambience was pleasant too. Service was excellent--staff Margaret Choong and Eileen Wong were also extremely helpful and friendly :)

title: Exalted Ranked Property
desc: We stayed at the property last week to celebrate someone's birthday. I was quite impressed with my first interaction with the staff at reception area. We were given interconnected rooms at the 11th floor and yeah.. They "UPGRADED" are rooms. Awesome room space with bath tub in addition to separate space for bathing. Now that, I call an Excellent start of Vacation. Lol.. Breakfast spread was amazing with most humble and courteous staff. I can't thank enough the way they took care of kids. Swimming pool and gym is there and I am not going to comment as I didn't use them. Let me sum up the reasons you must stay at this hotel (they are not paying me for this.lol) 1. This is centrally located between the China town and Bugis street. 2. China town is 10 mins walk and you

title: Drinks At Amara Tapas Bar
desc: Perfect service from Tia, I came here with my friend it was good at Amara Tapas Bar here, celebrated Singapore 54th National Day with wonderful staff Tia... Great environment, Definitely we will be back again just for Tia, she made our day happy üòä Thanks to Tia!!!

title: Nice beers- good service
desc: Stop by every Tuesday night here for beers. Mary always treats us very well and makes sure we are taken care of. Nice that they provide water with our beers. Always a decent place to sit with friends. They have some nice happy our specials too.

title: Amara singapore
desc: Excellent services from the staff namely vithyah & manager rav... we will come back again and we will recommend to our friends.. We are happy with cozy environment and we're very happy to their services.

title: Casual outings
desc: Cosy ambience with good food, good location and centralise location to meet friends . Hospitality are awesome. Met a waitress that is hard working and take care of customer very well. Her name is Mary serving an outlet behind Amara. Try out.

title: Excellent stay
desc: The hotel is at convenient location, clean and with practical amenities. Special credits for the sangria copas vino restaurant and Vithyah, so happy and caring person and excellent service. Try seafood there. !

title: Wonderful Stay N Superb Service
desc: I stayed here for 5 days. Right from the check in till checkout everything was good. Rooms are spacious. Service of the hotel staff is really really nice which makes you to come back again again. Would love to extend thanks for Citi , Raymond n Raghu were brilliant in there line of duty. Because of guys we loved to stay and will come back again.

title: Affordable stay in Singapore
desc: The Amara is an affordable option for staying in Singapore. It‚Äôs conveniently located in the central business district and provides easy access to the city. The hotel offers many amenities such as a swimming pool and gym. Rooms are very clean and the breakfast is good!

title: good location to CBD
desc: Pro : I am giving 4-stars to the hotel, and an extra star to Raymond who is the manager from the front desk. He's very friendly and hospitality. He gave us a warm welcome while we arrived early at hotel and tried to help in anyway he can offer. Also introduce some delicious local food nearby. Amara should be very proud to have an superb employee like Raymond. Cons : the internet is very very poor, the water temperture was either too cold or too hot even I adjusted it by "millimeter".

title: Great staff, food and drink
desc: Mary Lou and her team - Rav and Tia, looked after us and provided very efficient and friendly service Plenty of good sharing plates, serving all tastes and appetite. Would recommend this place for groups and individuals

title: best hotel to stay
desc: located ideally in Tanjong Pagar area, the hotel is very closed to the nearest Tanjung Pagar MRT. If you are using MRT from the airport, it saves you the time as you don‚Äôt need to change to different lines to reach the hotel. the hotel is next to a small shopping mall full with food as well as nearby Japanese & Korean restaurants. the staff was also super friendly especially those in front office (Siti & Raymond ü•∞). given the price offered i would recommend this to travellers coming to singapore who wants the convenience & comfort.

title: Wedding Review
desc: I held a wedding in Amara Hotel, it was really a fuss free experience thanks to Amelia guiding me the whole time. I didn‚Äôt even hire a coordinator for my wedding, and she was patient to assist me throughout! She was happy to handle all my last minute changes as well, i highly recommend planning a wedding here! The food was also a 9/10 according to guests with lavish deco :) I had maximum fun with minimal stress.

title: Excellent Hotel and Attentive Staff
desc: We had our company new product launch event in mid-June 2019, we are very pleased to have it in this amazing hotel. We would like thank to Ms. Ira Ng, Catering Sales manager in particularly with her excellent service and also other operation team members Mr. Jeffrey, Mr. Alan, Mr. Andy, Mr. Isa, Mr. Gajen and part-timers ( Ms. Fadilah, Ms. Sania, Ms. Hazimah and Ms. Shasha ). All of them were so friendly and attentive where always welcomes you with a smile. Extremely nice and tidy place with excellent buffet lunch. 100% smooth arrangement for this entire one day event. Highly recommended for the company meeting and event. Thank you!

title: Business drinks at Amara - excellent!
desc: Great staff and service especially from Mary. We will be back here again. A great atmosphere for night time drinks. Warm and cozy with a lot.of great airflow- with extra cold beers! We are here on a business trip and this was the best spot we have been!

title: Nice stay
desc: Had a pleasant stay..ideally located within singapore, with great choice of food around the area. Staff was friendly and helpful. Thank you Zac and Raymond for thw warm welcome at the front desk..will definitely be back again.

title: Nice hotel with excellent friendly staff
desc: This is my 1st time at this hotel. The location is great, near Tanjong Pagar MRT Station, with lots of food sellers and restaurant. Breakfast is amazing, with the beautiful restaurant design, the food is also great. A very recommended hotel to stay at, business or vacation trip. Last but not least, Raymond helps us a lot. thanks again for Raymond.

title: Having drinks at amara hotel
desc: We came to amara tonight for drinks ,we really like this place, i enjoy a lot. Mary is alwys friendly and Rav is very professional. Great atmostphere and pleasnt. Alwys make me feel relex. Thanks to all.

title: Comfortable stay
desc: Location of this hotel is great with the MRT station just a short walk away. Plenty of eateries and restaurants within walking distance. The Silk Road, Elements and a Japanese restaurant at the hotel serve great food. My friend and I had a great time at the Element that serve yummy food and drinks. The waitress, Vithyah was great to chat with and settled us comfortably for a great relaxing evening. Also a big shout out to Rav who was working extra time that night and yet goes out of his way to make sure the guests were well taken care of. His professionalism in managing the place and interactiing with the guest are highly commended. On the first morning at breakfast, I was struggling with the coffee machine and Rav immediately came to my rescue. Thereafter, he remembered how I

title: Loved this Hotel
desc: The Hotel is great however the service is AMAZING. Raymond was outstanding. He has helpful with directions and advice on where to eat. Thomas at reception was also fantastic. Highly recommend the hotel.

title: Raymond the Concierge is a star!
desc: Stayed at the Amara for 4 nights - the rooms were comfortable and the staff were so lovely. The stand out employee was Raymond on front desk - he was so kind and helpful! He is also full of knowledge!

title: A great value and a wonderful staff all around.
desc: The concierge gentleman is so amazing and helpful with our stay. We are a family of 3 with our 5-year old son from America and concierge was so welcoming and friendly that he‚Äôs able to assist us with any questions we had. The element‚Äôs hostess lady is also a gem to this property. She was so kind and inviting every time we dine in for breakfast.
